name: Big Toe Pose
description: Big Toe Pose (Padangusthasana) is a beginner standing forward bend.  Grasp your big toe (or ankle) and lengthen your spine, gently stretching hamstrings and calming the mind.  Maintain a flat back and engage your core for optimal alignment.

name: Gorilla Pose
description: Gorilla Pose (Padahastasana) is a beginner standing forward bend.  Benefits include stretching hamstrings and spine.  Keep knees slightly bent, lengthen spine before bending, and reach for the floor without rounding your back.

name: Bird of Paradise Pose
description: A challenging standing balance (Svarga Dvijasana), Bird of Paradise Pose strengthens legs and core, improves balance & flexibility.  Maintain a straight spine, engage core, and lengthen through the extended leg.
